quote: What is right... what is wrong... you can't easily tell the difference. That's why you must keep thinking, whether what you are doing is right or not. That act itself, alone, can be called right.

Books are nice, aren't they? With just one sentence you can get lost in all sorts of dreams. They way I think of it, literature allows the reader's consciousness to deeply relish the author and be closer to him. And so, we freely walk around the world of the story from the yarn spinner's point of view. It's only when you immerse yourself in the world of a book that you are able to forget just who you are.
The sorrows of life...To not be able to live like yourself. The joys of life...To be able to die like yourself.
All we can do is live while losing things.
Sometimes good people make bad choices, it doesn't mean they are bad people. It means they are human.
Why should I apologize for being a monster? Has anyone ever apologized for turning me into one?
There's no way someone who can't even protect himself can protect anyone else, is there?

Isn't it arrogant to put a price on whether life is “higher” or “lower”, Kaneki? We are just bags of meat. The weak bow down and the strong devour them. Rather, if you compared them to all living things, it's humans who have shaved away the most lives.
You don't need to blame yourself just because you've hurt someone, just like when you're walking you can't really blame yourself to crush some ants.
I'm not going to protect you by being your shield or armor, but I'll be the dagger hidden below your pillow.
Why is it that the beautiful things are entwined more deeply with death than with life?
Never trust anyone too much... Remember the devil was once an angel...
I was wrong. I wasn't eating ghouls. I'm the one who was being eaten.
Human relationships are chemical reactions. If you have a reaction then you can never return back to your previous state of being.
All the liabilities in this world are due to the inadequacies of the person involved.
It's better to be hurt than to hurt others. Nice people can be happy with just that.
If you were to write a story with me in the lead role, it would certainly be… a tragedy.
As long as it's for the right cause, there's nothing wrong with playing dirty.
You only need a strong will and a clear purpose.
When you're in front of the enemy, even if your hands are trembling — fight.
If an angelic being fell from the sky and tried to live in this world of ours, I think even they would commit many wrongs.
There are times when you have to give up on one thing to preserve the other.
There's no such thing as fate. It's simply a combination of one circumstance and the next.
All of the disadvantages in this world stem from a person's lack of ability.
Doing what one likes is the right of the powerful.
All suffering in the world is born from an individual's incompetence.
Life is to constantly sin. Life is evil itself. I am aware I am evil... And so are you all. Now, come kill me and, I shall do the same.
We're always trying to justify our actions with ideals. But ideals cannot give grounds for killing another person. The act of taking a life will always be considered… evil.
It's not because we can't take vengeance that we should feel sorry. The real reason to feel sorry… is when one is hung up on revenge and can't live their own life.
We need to have a mask that we never take off.
The world runs on power. Everything is determined by the superior power. You are weak. That is why you lose.
